text: Country is a 1984 American drama movie directed by Richard Pearce. It stars Jessica Lange (in her Oscar nominated role), Sam Shepard, Wilford Brimley, Matt Clark and Sandra Seacat and was distributed by Touchstone Pictures. ==Other websites== * * * Category:1984 drama movies Category:1980s American drama movies Category:Movies set in Iowa Category:Movies about agriculture Category:Movies directed by Richard Pearce Category:1980s English-language movies Category:Movies about farmers Category:Disney movies Category:Movies about suicide
title: Country (movie)
